original_text: So say this: “This is what the Almighty Lord says. I removed my people from their own land and I sent them far away. I sent them to live among other nations and in other countries. But I am still near to them in the countries where they have gone.”
korean_text: 그런즉 너는 말하기를 주 여호와의 말씀에 내가 비록 그들을 멀리 이방인 가운데로 쫓아내어 여러 나라에 흩었으나 그들이 도달한 나라들에서 내가 잠깐 그들에게 성소가 되리라 하셨다 하고

sentences.original_text: This is what the Almighty Lord says.
I removed my people from their own land
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 내 백성을 그들의 땅에서 제거했다

sentences.original_text: and I sent them far away.
I sent them to live among other nations
sentences.korean_translation: 그들을 다른 민족들과 함께 살도록 보냈다

sentences.original_text: But I am still near to them
in the countries where they have gone.
